Quality of genotypes and sequences can be assessed with several functions. For genotypic data, by-locus summaries can be conducted with the _summarizeLoci_ function, which will also produce summeries for each strata:



dupGenotypes
haplotypeLikelihoods
LDgenepop
lowFreqSubs
qaqc
summarizeLoci
summarizeSeqs
